title.narrative: Support decentralisation and democratic transition

description.narrative:
Support the operationalisation process of decentralization and democratic transition with respect for the principles of transparency and accountability, which are inclusive and gender sensitive.
This is done by Strengtening the leadership and dialogue capacities of the national structures involved in operationalizinf decentralisation, including those of 'CNP-EGAL', and Improving the support services of the National Federation of Tunisian Towns ('FNVT') for municipalities incl. development of its lobbying and advocacy functions in order to ensure the participation of municipalities in the decentralisation process.

title.narrative: Support decentralisation and democratic transition

description.narrative:
Support the operationalisation process of decentralization and democratic transition with respect for the principles of transparency and accountability, which are inclusive and gender sensitive.
This is done by Strengtening the leadership and dialogue capacities of the national structures involved in operationalizinf decentralisation, including those of 'CNP-EGAL', and Improving the support services of the National Federation of Tunisian Towns ('FNVT') for municipalities incl. development of its lobbying and advocacy functions in order to ensure the participation of municipalities in the decentralisation process.

title.narrative: Organisational competences strengthened

description.narrative: The organizational competences and capacities for decentralization leadership are strengthened.

description.narrative: The organizational competences and capacities for decentralization leadership are strengthened.

title.narrative: FNVT support services for municipalities have improved

description.narrative: The ‘FNVT’ (National Federation of Tunisian Cities) has improved is support services for municipalities and has developed its lobbying and advocacy functions so as to ensure the participation of municipalities in the decentralization process.
